SELECT rsvCode ,rsvDetailCode ,rsvDetailSpace ,okayStoreCode ,okaySpaceType ,okaySpaceName ,rsvDetailItem ,itemTotalName ,rsvDetailNum ,rsvDetailOnePrice ,rsvState ,rsvStartDateTime
FROM tbPayment AS p INNER join tbRsv AS r ON p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode INNER join tbRsvRelation AS l ON r.rsvCode = l.rsvRelationRsvCode INNER join tbRsvDetail AS d ON l.rsvRelationRsvDetailCode = d.rsvDetailCode INNER join tbOkaySpace AS o ON d.rsvDetailSpace = o.okaySpaceCode Left join tbItemTotalAmount AS t ON d.rsvDetailItem = t.itemCode WHERE p.paymentCode = #{payCode};
SELECT * FROM tbPayment AS p INNER join tbRsv AS r on p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode WHERE p.paymentCode = #{paymentCode};

SELECT rsvCode , rsvUserId , rsvStoreCode , rsvUserName , rsvUserPhone , rsvUserEmail , rsvUserRequest , rsvTotalPrice , rsvStartDateTime , rsvEndDateTime , rsvRegDate , rsvState , storeId FROM tbRsv INNER join tbStore AS s on rsvStoreCode = storeCode WHERE rsvCode = #{rsvCode};
SELECT pointCode , pointID , pointAddList , pointSellList , pointList , pointPaymentCode , reviewCodepointReviewCode , pointModyfiDate FROM tbPointList

SELECT paymentCode ,paymentRsvCode ,paymentPrice , paymentUsePoint , paymentUseMoney , paymentAddPoint , paymentIP , paymentRegDate , rsvUserId , rsvStartDateTime , rsvState FROM tbPayment AS p INNER JOIN tbRsv AS r on p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode WHERE r.rsvUserId = #{SID};
SELECT SUM(pointList) FROM tbPointList WHERE pointID = #{pointID}
